tipo: change port reference of APIs and route outter acces to your project
description: 1-where the frontend is type ctrl + shift + f and look for apiURL; 2-the var apiURL should be redefined with http://host:port; 3-yet in frontend look for index.test.js or where you may find any reference of localhost:3000 and change it; 4-In the backend confirms the true database credentials;5-in backend yet change the adress of app.listen() to app.listen(port,host,callback function); 7-finally initiate all projects and test in a another pc;
